column1: Local Foods////My food was really good. I got the crispy chicken sandwich ($10) which is the same crispy chicken from benjy's
column3: and piled high with some condiments on a delicious bun. I would absolutely get this sandwich again
column4: it was yum! Each sandwich comes with two sides. The homemade potato chips were perfect and plentiful. The potato salad was just ok and could have used some salt
column5: but I didn't see any salt around
column6: so I just ate it bland and all. My husband had the tuna sandwich and it was good but nothing wow. Overall
column7: my friends all enjoyed their food.
